creator: oscgoogle@yahoo.com
text:
The textLength attribute of a text element works only if the text element
content starts at least with a non white character.

It doesn't work for example if the text element first child is a tspan element.

See thread:
http://www.nabble.com/textLength%3A-bug-or-feature--t1042323.html

This is now fixed in SVN.  There is still a problem where textLength="" on
<text> elements that have a <textPath> somewhere in them won't work, but I'll
file a separate bug for that.
creator: cam@apache.org
